mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_COMMU_COMMENT (COMMU_COMMENT_ID, COMMU_COMMENT_COMMU_ID, COMMU_COMMENT_CNTNT, COMMU_COMMENT_REGIST_DATE, COMMU_COMMENT_DEPTH, COMMU_COMMENT_ORDER, COMMU_COMMENT_MBER_ID, COMMU_COMMENT_REF_ID) VALUES (TB_COMMU_COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{commuCommentCommuId}, #{commuCommentCntnt}, #{commuCommentRegistDate}, #{commuCommentDepth}, #{commuCommentOrder}, #{commuCommentMberId}, #{commuCommentRefId})
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_COMMU_COMMENT SET COMMU_COMMENT_CNTNT = #{commuCommentCntnt}, COMMU_COMMENT_UPDATE_DATE = #{commuCommentUpdateDate} WHERE COMMU_COMMENT_ID = #{commuCommentId}
UPDATE TB_COMMU_COMMENT SET COMMU_COMMENT_DEPTH = #{commuCommentDepth}, COMMU_COMMENT_ORDER = #{commuCommentOrder} WHERE COMMU_COMMENT_REF_ID = #{commuCommentRefId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_COMMU_COMMENT WHERE COMMU_COMMENT_COMMU_ID = #{commuId} ORDER BY COALESCE(COMMU_COMMENT_UPDATE_DATE, COMMU_COMMENT_REGIST_DATE) DESC, COMMU_COMMENT_ORDER DESC
